title: Ranked Solo Que Release Date
body:
Is there any news as to when the Solo/Duo Que ladder will be reopened again.

Thanks,
Rainin

replies.body: Just upvoted since im sure there's many players who are also waiting for this.

Am i the only one scared to play ranked because of this rubbish MMR readjustment? ive seen Diamond players go back to Silver because apparently Riot says thats where you actually belong? i seriously dont wanna climb out of silver again i didnt play that much but still wasnt good..

They said it was "planned" to be released today (16th Nov). Few hours ago, they said its coming "soon". 1 region has got solo/duo q ranked so far (Garena?). Other regions have been told it's "definitely coming in patch 6.22" (this patch). 

Who knows anymore man, it's Riot. Remember last year? Oh solo Q is coming guys, just wait a little longer.... Actually nah, Solo Q isnt coming back.

Same old shit. Just chill in Flex, enjoy the unbalanced, tilted players, and don't forget to buy skins!

Yeah they pushed it back. I'm not surprised at all, expected it 100%. Their heads are so far stuck up their asses trying to save flex Queue so it doesn't look like the complete pile of steaming trash that it is, but this is likely gonna be the queue we are slapped with permanantly. They did it last year with dynamic, they **will** do it again with Flex queue this year.              

They could release Soloq. They have the tools and the resources to get a system up and running that works properly. It's what a majority of players want to happen, but nope. They will make us pry soloq from their cold, dead hands before they dare remove their newborn flex q.         

At this point I'm just waiting, *waiting* for them to announce tomorrow "We are gonna delay soloQ by another week, maybe even two, as we try to resolve flex q issues." "planned activation fucking Never you plebs"
The reason it was delayed was more than likely due to the issues with Flex, as they had to determine what caused those issues so they could make sure the same didn't happen to solo/duo.

Solo/que will have no placements because it's rank is just the same for preseason from dynamic que. If anything I think they are wanting to confirm more statistics on player base and certain times to prevent long que timers. Hopefully it's up soon!!

The placement matches themselves weren't the issue with flex, rather they were a result of the larger issue, which was the broken matchmaking and complete lack of seeding, a problem which could very well affect solo/duo as well.

The release in preseason itself for solo/duo is essentially the test for queue times and stability.
They said it would be released in a week, so hopefully asap
Garena has enable solo/duo queue yesterday. I don't know Oce but from the pinned post it should be today.
